dcterms:creator: Quora
dcterms:description: A dataset containing over 400,000 question pairs, each labeled as paraphrase or not, used for paraphrase identification tasks.
dcterms:title: Quora Question Pairs

dcterms:creator: Samuel R. Bowman
Gabor Angeli
Christopher Potts
Christopher D. Manning
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 570,152 sentence pairs labeled with entailment, contradiction, or neutral, used for natural language inference tasks.
dcterms:title: SNLI

dcterms:creator: Adina Williams
Nikita Nangia
Samuel R. Bowman
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 392,702 sentence pairs across multiple genres, used for natural language inference tasks, including matched and mismatched test examples.
dcterms:title: MultiNLI

dcterms:creator: Pranav Rajpurkar
Jian Zhang
Konstantin Lopyrev
Percy Liang
dcterms:description: A dataset containing question-answer pairs extracted from Wikipedia articles, used for answer sentence selection tasks.
dcterms:title: SQuAD
